verses.verse: And it came to pass in the eleventh <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the third <S%H7992><s%> month <S%H259><s%>, in the first day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and to his multitude <S%H1995><s%>: Whom art thou like <S%H1819><s%> in thy greatness <S%H1433><s%>?

Behold <S%H804><s%>, the Assyrian was a cedar <S%H730><s%> in Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> with fair <S%H3303><s%> branches <S%H6057><s%>, and with a forest-like <S%H6751><s%> shade <S%H2793><s%>, and of high <S%H1362><s%> stature <S%H6967><s%>; and its top <S%H6788><s%> was among the thick boughs <S%H5688><s%>.

The waters <S%H4325><s%> nourished <S%H1431><s%> it <S%H8415><s%>, the deep made it to grow <S%H7311><s%>: the rivers <S%H5104><s%> thereof ran <S%H1980><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> its plantation <S%H4302><s%>; and it sent out <S%H7971><s%> its channels <S%H8585><s%> unto all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>.

Therefore its stature <S%H6967><s%> was exalted <S%H1361><s%> above all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>; and its boughs <S%H5634><s%> were multiplied <S%H7235><s%>, and its branches <S%H6288><s%> became long <S%H748><s%> by reason of many <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, when it shot them forth <S%H7971><s%>.

All the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> made their nests <S%H7077><s%> in its boughs <S%H5589><s%>; and under its branches <S%H6288><s%> did all the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> bring forth their young <S%H3205><s%>; and under its shadow <S%H6738><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> all great <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>.
Thus was it fair <S%H3302><s%> in its greatness <S%H1433><s%>, in the length <S%H753><s%> of its branches <S%H1808><s%>; for its root <S%H8328><s%> was by many <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>.

The cedars <S%H730><s%> in the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> could not hide <S%H6004><s%> it <S%H1265><s%>; the fir-trees were not like <S%H1819><s%> its boughs <S%H5589><s%>, and the plane-trees <S%H6196><s%> were not as its branches <S%H6288><s%>; nor was any tree <S%H6086><s%> in the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> like <S%H1819><s%> unto it in its beauty <S%H3308><s%>.

I made <S%H6213><s%> it fair <S%H3303><s%> by the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of its branches <S%H1808><s%>, so that all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%>, that were in the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, envied it <S%H7065><s%>.

Therefore thus said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because thou art exalted <S%H1361><s%> in stature <S%H6967><s%>, and he hath set <S%H5414><s%> his top <S%H6788><s%> among the thick boughs <S%H5688><s%>, and his heart <S%H3824><s%> is lifted up <S%H7311><s%> in his height <S%H1363><s%>;

I will even deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty one <S%H410><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>; he shall surely <S%H6213><s%> deal <S%H6213><s%> with him <S%H1644><s%>; I have driven him out for his wickedness <S%H7562><s%>.

And strangers <S%H2114><s%>, the terrible <S%H6184><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, have cut him off <S%H3772><s%>, and have left <S%H5203><s%> him <S%H2022><s%>: upon the mountains and in all the valleys <S%H1516><s%> his branches <S%H1808><s%> are fallen <S%H5307><s%>, and his boughs <S%H6288><s%> are broken <S%H7665><s%> by all the watercourses <S%H650><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; and all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> are gone down <S%H3381><s%> from his shadow <S%H6738><s%>, and have left him <S%H5203><s%>.

Upon his ruin <S%H4658><s%> all the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%>, and all the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall be upon his branches <S%H6288><s%>;

to the end that none of all the trees <S%H6086><s%> by the waters <S%H4325><s%> exalt <S%H1361><s%> themselves in their stature <S%H6967><s%>, neither set <S%H5414><s%> their top <S%H6788><s%> among the thick boughs <S%H5688><s%>, nor that their mighty ones <S%H352><s%> stand up <S%H5975><s%> on their height <S%H1363><s%>, even all that drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>: for they are all delivered <S%H5414><s%> unto death <S%H4194><s%>, to the nether parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H953><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: In the day <S%H3117><s%> when he went down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> I caused a mourning <S%H56><s%>: I covered <S%H3680><s%> the deep <S%H8415><s%> for him <S%H4513><s%>, and I restrained the rivers <S%H5104><s%> thereof <S%H7227><s%>; and the great waters <S%H4325><s%> were stayed <S%H3607><s%>; and I caused Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> to mourn <S%H6937><s%> for him <S%H6086><s%>, and all the trees of the field <S%H7704><s%> fainted for him <S%H5969><s%>.

I made the nations <S%H1471><s%> to shake <S%H7493><s%> at the sound <S%H6963><s%> of his fall <S%H4658><s%>, when I cast him down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> with them that descend <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>; and all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%>, the choice <S%H4005><s%> and best <S%H2896><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, all that drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>, were comforted <S%H5162><s%> in the nether parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

They also went down <S%H3381><s%> into Sheol <S%H7585><s%> with him unto them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>; yea <S%H2220><s%>, they that were his arm, that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> under his shadow <S%H6738><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

To whom art thou thus like <S%H1819><s%> in glory <S%H3519><s%> and in greatness <S%H1433><s%> among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%>? yet shalt thou be brought down <S%H3381><s%> with the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%> unto the nether parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: thou shalt lie <S%H7901><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%>, with them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>. This is Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all his multitude <S%H1995><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
